description.value:
Clerics of the Natural Dominion learn the following spells when able to cast Cleric spells of the same spell level.  These spells are always prepared and don’t count against your prepared spell amount.  

Dominion spells are considered Cleric spells when learned this way.  

 

Natural Dominion Spells

Able to Cast

Spells

1st Level Cleric Spells

@Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-1.4952YYFV3OJ53IKQ]{Fists of Stone}, @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.spells-level-1.WH828JD6WRDOM2M3]{Tame Beast}

2nd Level Cleric Spells

@Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.spells-level-2.IGNXR8HBQZS1JVCY]{Ophidian Kiss}, @Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-2.UEGGABQ79I8A8CG5]{Twister}

3rd Level Cleric Spells

Astringent Bog, @Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-3.W7NSYVVHKA2Q2MBJ]{Geyser}

4th Level Cleric Spells

@Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-4.YL8USCAX1ZTDKOA1]{Shapeshift}, @Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-4.2C1AA6FEY5D1JHV5]{Trapdoor Sinkhole}

5th Level Cleric Spells

Safe Arbor*, @Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-5.H2RO4K8JLYTVNEXB]{Winter's Piercing Ray}
